p.note: No translation provided by the edition

div.p: [NN ...] to the oikonomoi [...] and to royal scribes and [... and] to the policemen and to the [...] , greetings. We have appointed [...] mentioned below [...] should follow (his orders) [...]. Translation with slight modifications: B. Van Beek in P.Petr.Kleon, p. 144, Â© Peeters
